column4: any help from anyone im having probs with resolution and desktop effects with a 8800gts 512mb
any help from anyone im having probs with resolution and desktop effects with a 8800gts 512mb\
the ubuntu drivers don't have the latest support for the 8800gt , you'll need the one from nvidia.com. Or wait for hardy
your question isn't very clear, at all.
its all i know
ok.   what happens when you type    sudo dpkg -f install   in a terminal?
dpkg-deb: failed to read archive `install': No such file or directory
that's not what I said to type:     sudo apt-get -f install  , just that, on one line
um it is what u said but one sec
it says segmentation fault (core dumped)
very strange.  put the complete output on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
I need the url
i guess its this, rather newbish http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/57552/
wow. You have a serious problem, way over my head. I'm decent with using apt, but what would go on internally to cause a segmentation fault ...
i dunno like, idk why either, cause i havent really messed with anything either
it just kinda popped up today, was fine other day
any ideas on maybe where i could go then?
here. Some of the developers pass through regularly, try saying ' apt-get -f  install results in a segmentation fault. I really need some help with this." every 15 minutes or so
thanks
your screen turning red, saying some memory is bad. My machine froze with bad memory, but I can imagine getting segfaults instead
hmm that would suck cause it seems fine otherwise so ok ill brb
you'll need to let it run for a couple hours to be sure
